posts.message:
Jodod Technology Labs is looking for a skilled development team lead in Mansoura, Egypt. They will lead a highly competent team and will be responsible of delivering high quality software and meeting hard deadlines. They will also be responsible of critical technical decisions, maintaining the team harmony and skills diversity and orchestrating daily work between different team members. Jodod Technology Labs uses open source software and follows an agile development approach.
--
Requirements:
--
----Highly skilled with strong experience in one or more of the following languages: Python, Ruby or Java.
----Strong experience in web technologies and frameworks such as Django, Ruby on Rails, J2EE, GWT, ...etc.
----Strong experience of the Linux/Unix operating systems.
----Strong experience in developing over Linux/Unix operating systems.
----Strong knowledge in object oriented analysis and design.
----Familiar with agile methodologies, test driven development and SCRUM.
----Well disciplined with strong communication skills and a fast learner who can adapt to a rapidly changing environment.
--
Candidates can send their resume to jobs@jodod.com with the subject of "Team Lead".
Technical project manager required for web and mobile apps.

posts.message:
Richard M. Stallman, Linus Thorvalds, and Donald E. Knuth engage in a discussion on whose impact on the computerized world was the greatest.
Stallman: "God told me I have programmed the best editor in the world!"
Thorvalds: "Well, God told me that I have programmed the best operating system in the world!"
Knuth: "Wait, wait - I never said that."

فكرة المشروع: هو عبارة عن نظام يقدم تقنية للتفاعل مع الأدوات شائعة الاستخدام في الحياة اليومية بطريقة سهلة يستطيع النظام التعرف ومتابعة حركة الأدوات التي تم التعرف عليها عنطريق الكامبرا (كينكت)، بالإضافة الي الحاق جهاز الاستشعار ثلاثي الابعاد بالسطح المستخدم لتسهيل التعامل مع النظام كما يقوم المستخدم باستخدام أصبعه وتحريكه للتحكم والتعامل مع واجهة النظام. — with Magdy Kaoud and 9 others at Nahdet EL Mahrousa.
posts.description:
VOTE NOW FOR THE BEST PROJECT, and HELP the group to be one of our winners.

Yomken.com and The Young Innovators' Awards Program 

The prototype competition is a national competition which provides grant awards to young Egyptian innovators who develop innovative prototypes and products in the fields of science and technology. The prototypes should help solve challenges faced in the Egyptian industry and help introduce new innovation in the market.

We are now in the 3rd and last part of "shaghal" - The #YIA_prototype_competition 

3 Special Prizes for runners-up, focused on products (not services/Low-tech) that are not high intensive in technology:
- 1000$
- 600$
- 400$

في مسابقة #شغال من
 #YIA للحلول ”Low-Tech” مع Yomken.com!
المبتكرين ال10 حاولوا يحلوا مشاكل موجودة حولينا، باستخدام موارد أولية، وده دورنا اننا نساعدهم عشان يخدوا خطوة جديدة، ويكملوا شغل علي حلمهم.
لو عاجبك مشروع، اعمل like وبعدين
 share ، واكتبلهم
 comments تشجعهم. 

المشروع الأول هاياخد 1000 دولار -اكتر مشروع هاياخد Likes- الثاني 600 دولار والثالث 400 دولار.

هاتبدأ المسابقة بكره، الخميس 26 ديسمبر وتستمر لمدة أسبوع! 

تحمسوا، واخبطوا Like!! :))

ال10 مجموعات هم: 
1. BioEgypt
2. ERS
3. E-University 
4. Nu-Baby
5. Robotics
6. Smart Interaction 
7. Smart Outdoor Lightening System Project 
8. Smart Partner 
9. Smart Welding Iron 
10. Stair Climber Wheel Chair
